pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ising Model for Spatial Data // Performs simulations of binary spatial raster data using the Ising model (Ising (1925) doi:10.1007/BF02980577; Onsager (1944) doi:10.1103/PhysRev.65.117). It allows to set a few parameters that represent internal and external pressures, and the number of simulations (Stepinski and Nowosad (2023) doi:10.1098/rsos.231005).
